mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_center_purchase(f_center_id, f_supplier_id, f_commodity_id, f_number, f_price, f_status) VALUES (#{centerId}, #{supplierId}, #{commodityId}, #{number}, #{price}, #{status});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_center_purchase SET f_center_id=#{centerId}, f_commodity_id=#{commodityId}, f_supplier_id=#{supplierId}, f_price=#{price}, f_number=#{number}, f_status=#{status} WHERE f_id=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT A.f_id as id, A.f_center_id as centerId, A.f_commodity_id as commodityId, A.f_supplier_id as supplierId, B.f_name as centerName, C.f_name as commodityName, D.f_name as supplierName,A.f_price as price, A.f_number as number, A.f_status as status, A.f_create_time as createTime, A.f_update_time as updateTime from t_center_purchase A, t_distribution_center B, t_commodity C, t_supplier D WHERE A.f_center_id=B.f_id and A.f_commodity_id=C.f_id and A.f_supplier_id=D.f_id
